text: John William "Jack" Casady (born April 13, 1944) is an American musician. He is called one of the popular bass guitarists of the rock music era. He is best known as a member of Jefferson Airplane and Hot Tuna. He was born in Washington, D.C.. He became the bass player for Jefferson Airplane with lead guitarist Jorma Kaukonen and Paul Kantner. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Jack Casady website requires Flash * Jack Cassady in SVT Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Jefferson Airplane members Category:American guitarists Category:American rock musicians Category:American blues musicians Category:Musicians from Washington, D.C.
title: Jack Casady
